summary:
Whether you\'re dabbing your blade in it or carefully placing it in someone\'s pocket, poison in Skyrim has always been pretty useless.

This mod changes that...
descriptionHtml:
Whether you\'re dabbing your blade in it or onto an arrow, poison in Skyrim has always been pretty useless.

This simple mod changes that and makes poison more deadly and readily available to people who aren\'t willing to spend hours become a master alchemist. This gives the player a satisfying new method of killing enemies. The stronger poison comes at a higher price however, so you better get saving! 


*FEATURES*
Makes all health damaging poisons 3x stronger (but comes at a higher price)
Makes the length of all lingering poisons 2x stronger and 2x longer (also comes at a higher price)
Adds \'Tarlixeze the Shady\' to \'The Bee and Barb\' in Riften, the local poison supplier

If you wish to contact me, add me on steam: Øñîöñ ?ô?
author: Onion Boy

files.name: Deadlier Poison Remastered
files.changelogHtml: Made Tarlixeze the Shady a 24 hour merchant
